title: Valley International Airport receives a large update in MSFS
description:
Valley International Airport (ICAO code: KHRL) is located in Harlingen, Texas. It is the largest airport in the Rio Grande Valley, offering a variety of airline options including Southwest Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Sun Country Airlines. The airport serves as a key gateway to South Padre Island and features modern facilities with the longest runways in the area3. It also handles significant air cargo operations, ranking among the top 80 airports in the United States for cargo. The good news: you are now available to land on this updated airport in MSFS. The addon adds several details to this airport but based on the screenshots it is hard to see if for example the interior is included

For a full overview of items added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
https://youtu.be/hU3dQiozwWk
